Uses of Interface
generation.Maze

Packages that use Maze
Package
Description
generation
This package contains classes used in the generation and representation of a maze.
gui
This package contains classes to establish the GUI for the maze game.

  • Uses of Maze in generation

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    MazeContainer
    Class encapsulates access to all information that constitutes a maze.

    Methods in gui with parameters of type Maze
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    StateGenerating.deliver​(Maze mazeConfig)
    The deliver method is the call back method for the background thread operated in the maze factory to deliver the ordered product, here the generated maze in its container, the MazeConfiguration object.
    void
    DistanceSensor.setMaze​(Maze maze)
    Provides the maze information that is necessary to make a DistanceSensor able to calculate distances.
    void
    ReliableSensor.setMaze​(Maze maze)
    This method provides the maze information that is necessary to make a ReliableSensor able to calculate distances.
    void
    RobotDriver.setMaze​(Maze maze)
    Provides the robot driver with the maze information.
    void
    StatePlaying.setMaze​(Maze maze)
    Provides the maze to play.
    void
    WallFollower.setMaze​(Maze maze)
    This method provides the Wizard with the maze information.
    void
    Wizard.setMaze​(Maze maze)
    This method provides the Wizard with the maze information.
    void
    StateGenerating.switchFromGeneratingToPlaying​(Maze maze)
    Switches the controller to the playing screen.
